/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is lined with trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the distance, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a soft, warm light. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
